section.section: Any person aggrieved by a final decision of the Secretary or the designated hearing officer in connection with a show cause order, a corrective order, or any other final order issued under this subtitle may take a direct judicial appeal.
The appeal shall be made as provided for judicial review of final decisions in the Administrative Procedure Act.

text.section: An appeal under this section does not stay automatically the order from which the appeal is taken.
